snippet.title: Super Raft Boat Together launches July 25th, 2023!
snippet.description:
Super Raft Boat Together launches on Steam July 25th, 2023!

The world's been flooded. All you have left is your Super Raft Boat… and your friends! Work together to expand your raft while fending off the strangely violent (and wealthy??) creatures of the sea in this multiplayer roguelike shooter. Will your crew survive and reach the Final Island?

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/SRBTSteam
Learn more: https://braceyourselfgames.com/super-raft-boat-together

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/BYG_Vancouver
https://twitter.com/ShatteredJGames

Join our Discords:
https://discord.gg/BraceYourselfGames
https://shatteredjournalgames.com/discord
